QuestData.Title: A Worthy Challenge: Flameweaver Koegler
QuestData.Description: $n, I need you to assemble a cunning group and venture forth into the depths of Scarlet Halls. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and put a stop to Flameweaver Koegler's book-burning ways.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Scarlet Halls Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Objective: Complete the Scarlet Halls Challenge Mode
